Mumbai’s Midnight Gardeners

Meet the people who keep their city running while the rest of the world sleeps.

(01:03:46:00) (01:03:47:00) It became a big problem. 2011 was a terrible year in my life. (01:03:52:15) Rajesh (Marathi) (01:04:01:05) I first met my girlfriend at my sister’s place. (01:04:08:10) (01:04:08:20) Then we started talking. (01:04:11:00) (01:04:12:00) She used to stay in Chembur and I stayed in Mankhurd. We talked on the phone for two or three years. (01:04:39:20) (01:04:40:05) Her older brother asked me what my plan was. I told him “I want to marry your sister.” (01:04:44:20) (01:04:45:15) I told him I already have a job. (01:05:23:20) (01:05:24:15) Then company where I was employed and most successful shut down in 2010. (01:05:32:10) (01:05:34:00) My boss and the 200 crore company, we were all bankrupt overnight.
